tag_list: tech, gaming, fiber, fiber-optic, broadband, telecommunications
overview:
Robert is a Founder of Chapman Group International based in Chattanooga, TN, USA. Chapman Group International is a “think tank” company that explores several areas of international business and the enhancement of international education and communications. Recently CGI has been acting on several projects in the US, UK and Southern African Region.

Robert, born Robert Howard Chapman, was raised in Chinhoyi, Zimbabwe and attended The University of North London and later moved to Atlanta, GA in early 2000.

The latest project from Chapman Group International is centered around Gaming. “Engage” is the newest and most advanced concept CGI is taking very serious and making great headway.
